title: Critérium du Dauphiné stage 2: Julian Alaphilippe wins with perfectly timed sprint
content:
Jumbo-Visma loses Steven Kruijswijk to a crash, and the two-time world champion shows signs of life a month before the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné stage 2: Julian Alaphilippe wins with perfectly timed sprint on Velo.
author: ahood
